descriptions:
Shiny particles are released from
its wings like a veil. It is said
to represent the crescent moon.

its wings like a veil. It is said
to represent the crescent moon.

On nights around the quarter moon,
the aurora from its tail extends
and undulates beautifully.

Those who sleep holding CRESSELIA’s
feather are assured of joyful dreams. It
is said to represent the crescent moon.

Those who sleep holding Cresselia’s feather are
assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent
the crescent moon.

Cresselia is reminiscent of the crescent moon. It leaves a brilliant
line of light in its wake as it flies across the night sky. I daresay
it resembles the heavenly maiden who created the Milky Way.
name: Cresselia
